statements: SELECT * FROM legal_regulations ORDER BY regulation_id DESC;
SELECT regulation_title, regulation_content FROM legal_regulations WHERE effective_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT regulation_title, effective_date FROM legal_regulations WHERE regulation_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM legal_regulations WHERE regulation_title LIKE '%privacy%';
SELECT * FROM legal_regulations ORDER BY effective_date ASC, regulation_title DESC;
SELECT * FROM legal_regulations WHERE regulation_id = 1;
SELECT regulation_title, regulation_content FROM legal_regulations WHERE effective_date > '2020-01-01';
SELECT regulation_title, effective_date FROM legal_regulations ORDER BY effective_date DESC;
SELECT regulation_id, regulation_title FROM legal_regulations WHERE regulation_title ILIKE '%privacy%';
SELECT * FROM legal_regulations WHERE effective_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM regulations;
SELECT title, enactment_date FROM regulations ORDER BY enactment_date DESC;
SELECT id, description FROM statutes WHERE publication_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT statute_number, title, publication_date FROM statutes WHERE statute_number LIKE 'AB%';
SELECT id, title, description FROM regulations WHERE description IS NOT NULL ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM regulations WHERE enactment_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT title, description FROM regulations WHERE title LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY enactment_date DESC;
SELECT id, title, publication_date FROM statutes WHERE publication_date < '2020-06-01' ORDER BY publication_date ASC;
SELECT title, enactment_date FROM regulations WHERE description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM statutes WHERE statute_number IN ('S123', 'S456', 'S789') ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM regulations;
SELECT regulation_name, regulation_category FROM regulations;
SELECT * FROM statutes WHERE statute_category = 'Tax';
SELECT reference_name, reference_url FROM references WHERE id = 7;
SELECT * FROM regulations WHERE regulation_name LIKE '%Safety%';
SELECT * FROM regulations WHERE id > 10 ORDER BY regulation_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT statute_name, statute_text FROM statutes WHERE statute_category = 'Law' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT regulation_name, regulation_category FROM regulations WHERE regulation_category IN ('Health', 'Safety') AND regulation_description LIKE '%important%' ORDER BY regulation_name;
SELECT reference_name, reference_url FROM references WHERE reference_url IS NOT NULL AND reference_description LIKE '%tutorial%' ORDER BY reference_name LIMIT 10;

SELECT id, regulation_name, regulation_description FROM regulations INNER JOIN statutes ON regulations.id = statutes.id WHERE statute_category = 'Finance' ORDER BY regulations.id DESC, statute_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Legal_Regulations;
SELECT statute_name, regulation_name FROM Statutes JOIN Legal_Regulations ON Statutes.regulation_id = Legal_Regulations.regulation_id;
SELECT subsection_title, section_number FROM Subsections JOIN Sections ON Subsections.section_id = Sections.section_id;
SELECT regulation_name, count(*) AS statutes_count FROM Legal_Regulations JOIN Statutes ON Legal_Regulations.regulation_id = Statutes.regulation_id GROUP BY Legal_Regulations.regulation_name;
SELECT * FROM Sections WHERE section_number LIKE '1%';
SELECT * FROM Legal_Regulations;
SELECT regulation_name, regulation_description FROM Legal_Regulations ORDER BY regulation_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Statutes WHERE statute_id = 3;
SELECT subsection_title FROM Subsections WHERE section_id = 5;
SELECT regulation_name, COUNT(*) AS total_statutes FROM Legal_Regulations JOIN Statutes ON Legal_Regulations.regulation_id = Statutes.regulation_id GROUP BY regulation_name HAVING total_statutes > 3;
SELECT * FROM regulations_table LIMIT 5;
SELECT regulation_name, regulation_description FROM regulations_table WHERE regulation_category = 'Environmental';
SELECT * FROM statutes_table WHERE statute_category = 'Criminal' ORDER BY statute_name ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT penalty_name, penalty_amount FROM penalties_table WHERE penalty_amount > 1000;
SELECT jurisdiction_name, jurisdiction_region FROM jurisdictions_table WHERE jurisdiction_region = 'Europe' ORDER BY jurisdiction_name DESC;
SELECT regulation_name, regulation_description FROM regulations_table;
SELECT statute_name, statute_category FROM statutes_table WHERE statute_category = 'Finance';
SELECT * FROM penalties_table WHERE penalty_amount > 1000 ORDER BY penalty_amount DESC;
SELECT jurisdiction_name, jurisdiction_region FROM jurisdictions_table WHERE jurisdiction_region = 'North America';
SELECT reference_name, reference_description, reference_source FROM references_table WHERE reference_source = 'Book';
